content: And now we music, with the Spicer Girls: www.youtube.com/watch?v=gJLIiF15wjQ(I do not know how to embed a video into a comment, but I’ll tell you what I want, what I really, really want, and that is for “the news” to stop wasting my precious time…if Mr. Spicer would get his act together, we could be just fine…urg.)
